title: Get every major AI model in one platform with 1minAI
content:
Macworld

We’ve seen dozens, if not hundreds, of new AI tools hit the market this year, but never one quite like this. While ChatGPT, Gemini, and all of the wannabe tools have their own specialties, 1minAI attempts to cover everything. Yeah.

It works by combining every major AI model into itself. So, instead of paying for each tool separately, you can just buy 1minAI and get access to them all. And they offer a lifetime subscription without recurring fees: $29.97 (reg. $234). 

The only catch is that you’re limited to a certain number of monthly credits, and the usage depends on which AI model you’re using (ChatGPT-4 consumes more than ChatGPT-3 and so on). You can earn more by visiting their website daily. Unused credits roll over for future use.

With every AI tool at your fingertips, you can generate blog posts, images, voice-overs, and more. These tools can also edit photos by removing or replacing backgrounds or writing or modifying code for your website.

Own this all-in-one AI tool for life while it’s $29.97 (reg. $234). 

 

1minAI: Lifetime Subscription – $29.97

Get It Here

StackSocial prices subject to change.
